```{r}
library(rmgarch)
library(tidyverse)
library(tibble)
```

```{r}
data <- read_csv("hnx_hose_merged.csv")
data <- data %>%
         column_to_rownames('Date')
```

```{r}
head(data)
```


```{r}
# define GARCH(1,1) model
univariate_spec <- ugarchspec(mean.model = list(armaOrder = c(0,0)),
                              variance.model = list(garchOrder = c(1,1), 
                                                    model = "sGARCH"),
                              distribution.model = "norm")

# define DCC(1,1) model
n <- dim(data)[2]
dcc_spec <- dccspec(uspec = multispec(replicate(n, univariate_spec)),
                    cccOrder = c(1,1),
                    distribution = "mvnorm")
dcc_fit <- dccfit(dcc_spec, data=data)
forecasts <- dccforecast(dcc_fit, n.ahead = 90)
```

```{r}
show(dcc_fit)
```
```{r}
plot(dcc_fit, which = 2)
```
